name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Vibrant Fusion of Sounds and Cultures**  

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret brings together an eclectic lineup of 52 artists, offering a rich tapestry of genres and styles. From the pulsating beats of Electronic and Hip-Hop to the raw energy of Post-Punk and Alternative Rock, the festival continues its tradition of celebrating diverse musical expressions. Indie Rock, R&B, and Psychedelic Rock also make a strong showing, reflecting the festival’s commitment to blending established and emerging sounds. With 98.1% of artists featured on Spotify, attendees can easily explore the lineup ahead of the event.  

This year’s lineup showcases a global perspective, with artists hailing from 16 countries. While the USA (11 acts) and the Netherlands (10 acts) dominate, the festival also highlights talent from Ghana, South Africa, Brazil, and Tanzania, underscoring its dedication to global representation. Diversity is further evident in the inclusion of artists of color, who make up 23% of the lineup, and the presence of mixed-gender and non-binary performers, emphasizing a broader spectrum of identities in the music world.  

With an average rating of 7.2 from 76.9% of the rated artists, the festival promises a high-quality experience for music lovers. A significant portion of the lineup has received strong ratings, particularly in the 7-8 range, indicating a well-curated selection of talent. Best Kept Secret 2026 is set to be a celebration of music’s unifying power, inviting fans to discover new artists while enjoying favorites in a diverse and inclusive environment.
